verses.verse: "Behold, <S%H5869><s%> my eye has seen <S%H7200><s%> all this. <S%H241><s%> My ear has heard <S%H8085><s%> and understood it. <S%H995><s%>
What you know, <S%H1847><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> also. <S%H5307><s%> I am not inferior to you.
"Surely <S%H199><s%> I would speak <S%H1696><s%> to the Almighty. <S%H7706><s%> I desire <S%H2654><s%> to reason <S%H3198><s%> with God. <S%H410><s%>
But <S%H199><s%> you are forgers <S%H2950><s%> of lies. <S%H8267><s%> You are all physicians <S%H7495><s%> of no value. <S%H457><s%>
Oh that <S%H5414><s%> you would be completely <S%H2790><s%> silent! <S%H2790><s%> Then you would be wise. <S%H2451><s%>
Hear <S%H8085><s%> now my reasoning. <S%H8433><s%> Listen <S%H7181><s%> to the pleadings <S%H7379><s%> of my lips. <S%H8193><s%>
Will you speak <S%H1696><s%> unrighteously <S%H5766><s%> for God, <S%H410><s%> and talk <S%H1696><s%> deceitfully for him? <S%H7423><s%>
Will you show <S%H5375><s%> partiality <S%H6440><s%> to him? <S%H7378><s%> Will you contend for God? <S%H410><s%>
Is it good <S%H2895><s%> that he should search you out? <S%H2713><s%> Or as one <S%H582><s%> deceives <S%H2048><s%> a man, <S%H2048><s%> will you deceive him?
He will surely <S%H3198><s%> reprove <S%H3198><s%> you if you secretly <S%H5643><s%> show <S%H5375><s%> partiality. <S%H6440><s%>
Shall not his majesty <S%H7613><s%> make you afraid, <S%H1204><s%> And his dread <S%H6343><s%> fall on you? <S%H5307><s%>
Your memorable <S%H2146><s%> sayings are <S%H4912><s%> proverbs of ashes, <S%H665><s%> Your defenses <S%H1354><s%> are defenses <S%H1354><s%> of clay. <S%H2563><s%>
"Be silent, <S%H2790><s%> leave me alone, <S%H1696><s%> that I may speak. Let come on me what will. <S%H5674><s%>
Why should I take <S%H5375><s%> my flesh <S%H1320><s%> in my teeth, <S%H8127><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%> in my hand? <S%H3709><s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> he will kill <S%H6991><s%> me. <S%H3176><s%> I have no hope. Nevertheless, <S%H3198><s%> I will maintain my ways <S%H1870><s%> before him. <S%H6440><s%>
This also shall be my salvation, <S%H3444><s%> that a godless <S%H2611><s%> man shall not come <S%H935><s%> before him. <S%H6440><s%>
Hear <S%H8085><s%> diligently <S%H8085><s%> my speech. <S%H4405><s%> Let my declaration <S%H262><s%> be in your ears. <S%H241><s%>
See now, <S%H6186><s%> I have set my cause <S%H4941><s%> in order. <S%H3045><s%> I know that I am righteous. <S%H6663><s%>
Who is he who will contend <S%H7378><s%> with me? <S%H2790><s%> For then would I hold my peace and give up the spirit. <S%H1478><s%>
"Only don't <S%H6213><s%> do two <S%H8147><s%> things to me; <S%H5641><s%> then I will not hide myself from your face: <S%H6440><s%>
withdraw <S%H7368><s%> your hand <S%H3709><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from me; <S%H367><s%> and don't let your terror make me afraid. <S%H367><s%>
Then call, <S%H7121><s%> and I will answer; <S%H6030><s%> or let me speak, <S%H1696><s%> and you answer me. <S%H7725><s%>
How many are my iniquities <S%H5771><s%> and sins? <S%H2403><s%> Make me know <S%H3045><s%> my disobedience <S%H6588><s%> and my sin. <S%H2403><s%>
Why hide <S%H5641><s%> you your face, <S%H6440><s%> and hold <S%H2803><s%> me for your enemy? <S%H341><s%>
Will you harass <S%H6206><s%> a driven <S%H5086><s%> leaf? <S%H5929><s%> Will you pursue <S%H7291><s%> the dry <S%H3002><s%> stubble? <S%H7179><s%>
For you write <S%H3789><s%> bitter things <S%H4846><s%> against me, <S%H3423><s%> and make me inherit the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of my youth: <S%H5271><s%>

You also put <S%H7760><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> in the stocks, <S%H5465><s%> and mark <S%H8104><s%> all my paths. <S%H734><s%> You set a bound <S%H2707><s%> to the soles <S%H8328><s%> of my feet, <S%H7272><s%>
though I am decaying <S%H1086><s%> like a rotten thing, <S%H7538><s%> like a garment <S%H899><s%> that is moth <S%H6211><s%> - eaten. <S%H398><s%>
